XXsspp2_1u:3244: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3245: yo bhagavan śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānam, iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3246: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3247: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam, iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3248: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3249: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānam, iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3250: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3251: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānam, iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ
XXsspp2_1u:3252: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3253: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3254: yo bhagavan manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānam, iti hi manovijñānaṃ
XXsspp2_1u:3255: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3256: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād (ŚsP_II-1_173) yo manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3257: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ, iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3258: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3259: yo bhagavan śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparaḥ, iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3260: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3261: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparaḥ, iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3262: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3263: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na tan jihvāsaṃsparśaaḥ, iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3264: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3265: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaaḥ, iti hi kāyasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3266: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3267: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaaḥ, iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3268: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3269: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3271: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3272: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3274: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3276: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3277: nānutpāda (ŚsP_II-1_174) eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3279: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3281: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3282: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3284: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3286: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3287: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3289: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3290: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā, iti hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā
XXsspp2_1u:3292: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3294: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3295: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3297: yo bhagavan pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ, iti hi pṛthivīdhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3298: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3299: yo bhagavan abdhātor anutpādo na so 'bdhātuḥ, iti hy abdhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'bdhātor anutpādo na so
XXsspp2_1u:3301: yo bhagavaṃs tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ, iti hi tejodhātuś
XXsspp2_1u:3302: (ŚsP_II-1_175) cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3303: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3304: yo bhagavan vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ, iti hi vāyudhātuś
XXsspp2_1u:3305: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3306: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na so vāyudhātuḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3307: yo bhagavann ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ, iti hy ākāśadhātuś
XXsspp2_1u:3308: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3309: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3310: yo bhagavan vijñānadhātor anutpādo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ, iti hi vijñānadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3311: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na so vijñānadhātuḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3312: yo bhagavann avidyāyā anutpādo na sāvidyā, iti hy avidyā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'vidyāyā anutpādo na sāvidyā,
XXsspp2_1u:3313: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ, iti hi saṃskārāś
XXsspp2_1u:3314: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3315: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3316: yo bhagavan vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam, iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3317: yo bhagavan nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpam, iti hi nāmarūpaṃ
XXsspp2_1u:3318: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3319: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3320: yo bhagavan ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanam, iti hi ṣaḍāyatanañ
XXsspp2_1u:3321: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3322: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād (ŚsP_II-1_176) yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3323: yo bhagavan sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ, iti hi sparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3324: yo bhagavan vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā, iti hi vedanāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
XXsspp2_1u:3325: yo bhagavan tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā, iti hi tṛṣṇāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
XXsspp2_1u:3326: yo bhagavan upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānam, iti hy upādānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3327: yo bhagavan bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ, iti hi bhavaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3328: yo bhagavan jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ, iti hi jātiś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na
XXsspp2_1u:3329: dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jātier anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3330: yo bhagavan jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo na taj jarāmaraṇam, iti hi jarāmaraṇaṃ
XXsspp2_1u:3331: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3332: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo
XXsspp2_1u:3334: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā, iti hi dānapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3335: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
XXsspp2_1u:3336: yo bhagavan śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā, iti hi śīlapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3337: (ŚsP_II-1_177) tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na
XXsspp2_1u:3338: pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
XXsspp2_1u:3339: yo bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā, iti hi kṣāntipāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3340: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
XXsspp2_1u:3341: yo bhagavan vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā, iti hi vīryapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3342: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
XXsspp2_1u:3343: yo bhagavan dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā, iti hi dhyānapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3344: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
XXsspp2_1u:3345: yo bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā, iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3346: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajnāpāramitā,
XXsspp2_1u:3347: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā, iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3348: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3349: yo bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā, iti hi bahirdhāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3350: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3351: yo bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā, iti hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
XXsspp2_1u:3353: yo bhagavan śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā, iti hi śūnyatāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3354: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād
XXsspp2_1u:3355: (ŚsP_II-1_178) yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3356: yo bhagavan mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā, iti hi mahāśūnyatā
XXsspp2_1u:3357: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3358: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo mahāśūnyatāyā
XXsspp2_1u:3360: yo bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā, iti hi paramārthaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3361: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3362: yo bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā, iti hi saṃskṛtaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3363: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3364: yo bhagavan asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā, iti hy asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3365: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3366: yo bhagavan atyantaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sātyantaśūnyatā, iti hy atyantaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3367: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'tyantaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sātyantaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3368: yo bhagavan anavarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā, iti hy anavarāgraśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3369: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'navarāgraśunyatāyā anutpādo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3370: yo bhagavan anavakāraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavakāraśūnyatā, iti hy anavakāraśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3371: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'navakāraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3372: yo bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā, iti hi prakṛtiśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3373: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3374: yo bhagavan sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3375: (ŚsP_II-1_179) iti hi sarvadharmaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_1u:3376: advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3378: yo bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā, iti hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3379: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3380: yo bhagavan anupalambhaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānupalambhaśūnyatā, iti hy anupalambhaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'nupalambhaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sa 'nupalambhaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3381: yo bhagavan abhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvaśūnyatā, iti hy abhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3382: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'bhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3383: yo bhagavan svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā, iti hi svabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3384: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3385: yo bhagavan abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3386: iti hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
XXsspp2_1u:3388: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānānīti hi smṛtyupasthānāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3389: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3390: yo bhagavan samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇānīti hi samyakprahāṇāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3391: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3392: yo bhagavann ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na te ṛddhipādā iti hy ṛddhipādāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3393: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmādy aṛddhipādānām anutpādo na ta ṛddhipādāḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3394: yo bhagavann indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇīti hīndriyāṇi cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇi,
XXsspp2_1u:3395: yo bhagavan balānām anutpādo na tāni balānīti hi balāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo balānām anutpādo na tāni
XXsspp2_1u:3397: yo bhagavan bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgānīti hi bodhyaṅgāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3398: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3399: yo bhagavann āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga iti hy āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3400: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3401: yo bhagavann āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyānīti hi āryasatyāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3402: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmādy aāryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3403: yo bhagavan dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni dhyānānīti hi dhyānāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni
XXsspp2_1u:3405: yo bhagavann apramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇānīti hy apramāṇāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3406: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'pramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3407: yo bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattaya iti hy ārūpyasamāpattayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. (ŚsP_II-1_181)
XXsspp2_1u:3408: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na
XXsspp2_1u:3409: pṛthak, tasmād ya ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3410: yo bhagavan vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣā iti hi vimokṣāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te
XXsspp2_1u:3412: yo bhagavann anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti hy anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo nupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām
XXsspp2_1u:3414: yo bhagavann śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti hi śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_1u:3415: advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām
XXsspp2_1u:3417: yo bhagavann abhijñānām anutpādo na tā abhijñā iti hy abhijñāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'bhijñānām anutpādo na tā
XXsspp2_1u:3419: yo bhagavan samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhaya iti hy samādhayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3420: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3421: yo bhagavann dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhānīti hy dhāraṇīmukhāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3422: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāny dhāraṇīmukhāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3423: yo bhagavan daśatathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni daśatathāgatabalānīti hi daśatathāgatabalāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo daśatathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni daśatathāgatabalāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3424: yo bhagavan vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyānīti hi vaiśāradyāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3425: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vaiśāradyānām
XXsspp2_1u:3427: yo bhagavan pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tāḥ pratisaṃvida iti hi pratisaṃvidaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3428: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3429: yo bhagavan mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sa mahāmaitrī iti hi mahāmaitrī cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3430: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
XXsspp2_1u:3431: yo bhagavan mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā, iti hi mahākaruṇā
XXsspp2_1u:3432: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3433: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
XXsspp2_1u:3434: yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmānām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmā iti hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_1u:3435: advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta
XXsspp2_1u:3437: yo bhagavan tathatāyā anutpādo na sa tathatā, iti hi tathatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ tathatāyā anutpādo na sa
XXsspp2_1u:3439: yo bhagavan dharmatāyā anutpādo na tā dharmatā, iti hi dharmatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo dharmatāyā anutpādo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3441: yo bhagavan dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ, iti hi dharmadhātuś
XXsspp2_1u:3442: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3443: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3444: yo bhagavan dharmaniyāmatāyā anutpādo na sa dharmaniyāmatā, iti hi (ŚsP_II-1_183) dharmaniyāmatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
XXsspp2_1u:3445: tasmād yo dharmaniyāmatāyā anutpādo na ta dharmaniyāmatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3446: yo bhagavan bhūtakoṭer anutpādo na sā bhūtakoṭir iti hi bhūtakoṭiś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3447: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo bhūtakoṭer anutpādo na sā bhūtakoṭiḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3448: yo bhagavann acintyadhātor anutpādo na so 'cintyahātuḥ, iti hy acintyadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3449: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'cintyadhātor anutpādo na so 'cintyadhātuḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3450: yo bhagavan sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā, iti hi sarvajñatā
XXsspp2_1u:3451: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3452: nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ sarvajñatāyā
XXsspp2_1u:3454: yo bhagavan mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā, iti hi mārgākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3455: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3456: yo bhagavan sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā, iti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3457: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
XXsspp2_1u:3458: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam, iti hi rūpañ ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3459: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3460: yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā, iti hi vedanā ca vyayas cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3461: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
XXsspp2_1u:3462: yo bhagavan saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā, iti hi saṃjñā ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3463: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na (ŚsP_II-1_184)
XXsspp2_1u:3464: vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3466: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ, iti hi saṃskārāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ saṃskārānāṃ vyayo na te
XXsspp2_1u:3468: yo bhagavan vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam, iti hi vijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad
XXsspp2_1u:3470: yo bhagavan cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ, iti hi cakṣuś ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3471: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaś cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3472: yo bhagavan chrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotram, iti hi śrotraṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śrotrasya vyayo na tac
XXsspp2_1u:3474: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇam, iti hi ghrāṇaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3475: yo bhagavan jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā, iti hi jihvā ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3476: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
XXsspp2_1u:3477: yo bhagavan kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ, iti hi kāyaś ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3478: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3479: yo bhagavan manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ, iti hi manaś ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3480: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ.
XXsspp2_1u:3481: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam iti hi rūpaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3482: yo bhagavan śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ, iti hi śabdaś ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3483: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3484: yo bhagavan gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ, iti hi gandhaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3485: yo bhagavan rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ, iti hi rasaś ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3486: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3487: yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ, iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3488: yo bhagavan dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ, iti hi dharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3489: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānam, iti hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3490: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3491: yo bhagavan chrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānam, iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3492: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3493: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam, iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3494: (ŚsP_II-1_186) tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
XXsspp2_1u:3495: tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3496: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānam, iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3497: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3498: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānam, iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ
XXsspp2_1u:3499: ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3500: na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3501: yo bhagavan manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam, iti hi manovijñānaṃ
XXsspp2_1u:3502: ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3503: na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam.
XXsspp2_1u:3504: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ, iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3505: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3506: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ, iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3507: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśassya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3508: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ, iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3509: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3510: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvasaṃsparśaḥ, iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3511: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3512: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ, iti hi kāyasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3513: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3514: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ, iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3515: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
XXsspp2_1u:3516: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3517: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā, iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
XXsspp2_1u:3518: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3519: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā, iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
XXsspp2_1u:3520: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3521: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā, iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
XXsspp2_1u:3522: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3523: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā, iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
XXsspp2_1u:3524: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3525: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā, iti hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā
XXsspp2_1u:3527: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3528: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā, iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
XXsspp2_1u:3529: yo bhagavan pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ, iti hi pṛthivīdhātuś
XXsspp2_1u:3530: ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3531: na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3532: yo bhagavann abdhātor vyayo na so 'bdhātuḥ, iti hy abdhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'bdhātor vyayo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3533: yo bhagavaṃs tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ, iti hi tejodhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ tejodhātor vyayo na sa
XXsspp2_1u:3535: yo bhagavan vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ, iti hi vāyudhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vāyudhātor vyayo na so
XXsspp2_1u:3537: yo bhagavann ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa akāśadhātuḥ, iti hy ākāśadhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa
XXsspp2_1u:3539: yo bhagavan vijñānadhātor vyayo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ, iti hi vijñānadhātuś
XXsspp2_1u:3540: ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3541: na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vijñānadhātor vyayo na so vijñānadhātuḥ.
XXsspp2_1u:3542: yo bhagavann avidyāyā vyayo na sāvidyā, iti hy avidyā ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3543: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'vidyāyā vyayo na sāvidyā,
XXsspp2_1u:3544: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ, iti hi saṃskārāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te
XXsspp2_1u:3546: yo bhagavan vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam, iti hi vijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3547: (ŚsP_II-1_189) na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3548: yo bhagavan nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpam, iti hi nāmarūpaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan
XXsspp2_1u:3550: yo bhagavan ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanam, iti hi ṣaḍāyatanañ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
XXsspp2_1u:3551: yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ, iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3552: yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā, iti hi vedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3553: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
XXsspp2_1u:3554: yo bhagavan tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā, iti hi tṛṣṇā ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3555: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
XXsspp2_1u:3556: yo bhagavan upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānam, iti hy upādānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya upādānasya vyayo na tad
XXsspp2_1u:3558: yo bhagavan bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ, iti hi bhavaś ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3559: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3560: yo bhagavan jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ, iti hi jātiś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_1u:3561: advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na
XXsspp2_1u:3562: bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3563: yo bhagavan jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam, iti hi (ŚsP_II-1_190)
XXsspp2_1u:3564: jarāmaraṇaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam.
XXsspp2_1u:3565: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā, iti hi dānapāramitā
XXsspp2_1u:3566: ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3567: na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,
XXsspp2_1u:3568: yo bhagavan śīlapāramitāyā vyayo na sā śīlapāramitā, iti hi śīlapāramitā
XXsspp2_1u:3569: ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3570: na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā vyayo na sā śīlapāramitā,
XXsspp2_1u:3571: yo bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāyā vyayo na sā kṣāntipāramitā, iti hi kṣāntipāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3572: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vyayo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
XXsspp2_1u:3573: yo bhagavan vīryapāramitāyā vyayo na sā vīryapāramitā, iti hi vīryapāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3574: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vīryapāramitāyā vyayo na sā vīryapāramitā,
XXsspp2_1u:3575: yo bhagavan dhyānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dhyānapāramitā, iti hi dhyānapāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3576: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo dhyānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
XXsspp2_1u:3577: yo bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā, iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3578: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
XXsspp2_1u:3579: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā, iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3580: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3581: yo bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā, iti hi bahirdhāśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3582: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, (ŚsP_II-1_191)
XXsspp2_1u:3583: tasmād yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3584: yo bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3585: iti hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
XXsspp2_1u:3587: yo bhagavan śūnyatāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā, iti hi śūnyatāśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3588: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3589: yo bhagavan mahāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā mahāśūnyatā, iti hi mahāśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo mahāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3591: yo bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā, iti hi paramārthaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3592: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3593: yo bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā, iti hi saṃskṛtaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3594: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3595: yo bhagavann asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā, iti hy asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3596: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3597: yo bhagavann atyantaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sātyantaśūnyatā, iti hy atyantaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3598: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'tyantaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sātyantaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3599: yo bhagavann anavarāgraśūnyatāyā vyayo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā, iti hy anavarāgraśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3600: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'navarāgraśūnyatāyā vyayo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3601: yo bhagavann anavakāraśūnyatāyā vyayo na sānavakāraśūnyatā, iti hy anavakāraśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3602: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'navakāraśūnyatāyā vyayo na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3603: yo bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā, iti hi prakṛtiśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3604: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3605: yo bhagavan sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā, iti hi sarvadharmaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3606: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3607: yo bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā, iti hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3608: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3609: yo bhagavann anupalambhaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sānupalambhaśūnyatā, iti hy anupalambhaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3610: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'nupalambhaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sānupalambhaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3611: yo bhagavann abhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sābhāvaśūnyatā, iti hy abhāvaśūnyatā
XXsspp2_1u:3612: ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3613: na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'bhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3614: yo bhagavan svabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā, iti hi svabhāvaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3615: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3616: yo bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā, iti hy abhāvasvabhāvaśunyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3617: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānānīti
XXsspp2_1u:3618: (ŚsP_II-1_193) hi smṛtyupasthānāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
XXsspp2_1u:3619: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3620: yo bhagavan samyakprahāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāni samyakprahāṇānīti hi samyakprahāṇāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3621: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ samyakprahāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3622: yo bhagavann ṛddhipādānāṃ vyayo na te ṛddhipādā, iti hy ṛddhipādāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya ṛddhipādānāṃ vyayo na ta
XXsspp2_1u:3624: yo bhagavann indriyāṇāṃ vyayo na tānīndriyāṇi, iti hīndriyāṇi ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya indriyāṇāṃ vyayo na tānīndriyāṇi,
XXsspp2_1u:3625: yo bhagavan balānāṃ vyayo na tāni balāni, iti hi balāni ca vyayaś cādvayam
XXsspp2_1u:3626: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo balānāṃ vyayo na tāni balāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3627: yo bhagavan bodhyaṅgānāṃ vyayo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni, iti hi bodhyaṅgāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo bodhyaṅgānāṃ vyayo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3628: yo bhagavann āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasya vyayo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga iti hy āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3629: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasya vyayo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3630: yo bhagavann āryasatyānāṃ vyayo na tāny āryasatyāni, iti hi āryasatyāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya āryasatyānāṃ vyayo na tāny āryasatyāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3631: yo bhagavan dhyānānāṃ vyayo na tāni dhyānānīti hi dhyānāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo dhyānānāṃ vyayo (ŚsP_II-1_194)
XXsspp2_1u:3633: yo bhagavann apramāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāny apramāṇānīti hy apramāṇāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'pramāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāny
XXsspp2_1u:3635: yo bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ vyayo na tā ārūpyasamāpattaya iti hy ārūpyasamāpattayaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3636: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ vyayo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3637: yo bhagavan vimokṣāṇāṃ vyayo na te vimokṣā iti hi vimokṣāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vimokṣāṇāṃ vyayo na te
XXsspp2_1u:3639: yo bhagavan navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ vyayo na tā
XXsspp2_1u:3640: anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ, iti hy anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ
XXsspp2_1u:3642: yo bhagavañ chūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ vyayo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti hi śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na
XXsspp2_1u:3643: bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ vyayo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3644: yo bhagavann abhijñānāṃ vyayo na tā abhijñā, iti hy abhijñāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo 'bhijñānāṃ vyayo na tā
XXsspp2_1u:3646: yo bhagavan samādhīnāṃ vyayo na te samādhayaḥ, iti hi samādhayaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ samādhīnāṃ vyayo na te
XXsspp2_1u:3648: yo bhagavan dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ vyayo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhānīti hy dhāraṇīmukhāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3649: (ŚsP_II-1_195) tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
XXsspp2_1u:3650: tasmād yo dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ vyayo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3651: yo bhagavan daśatathāgatabalānāṃ vyayo na tāni daśatathāgatabalānīti hi daśatathāgatabalāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo daśatathāgatabalānāṃ vyayo na tāni daśatathāgatabalāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3652: yo bhagavan vaiśāradyānāṃ vyayo na tāni vaiśāradyānīti hi vaiśāradyāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vaiśāradyānāṃ vyayo na tāni vaiśāradyāni,
XXsspp2_1u:3653: yo bhagavan pratisaṃvidāṃ vyayo na tāḥ pratisaṃvida iti hi pratisaṃvidaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
XXsspp2_1u:3654: na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ pratisaṃvidāṃ vyayo na tāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
XXsspp2_1u:3655: yo bhagavan mahāmaitryā vyayo na sā mahāmaitrī, iti hi mahāmaitrī ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo mahāmaitryā vyayo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3657: yo bhagavan mahākaruṇāyā vyayo na sā mahākaruṇā, iti hi mahākaruṇā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo mahākaruṇāyā vyayo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3659: yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na ta
XXsspp2_1u:3660: āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ, iti hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad
XXsspp2_1u:3661: advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na
XXsspp2_1u:3662: bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na ta
XXsspp2_1u:3664: yo bhagavan sarvajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvajñatā, iti hi sarvajñatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ sarvajñatāyā vyayo na sā
XXsspp2_1u:3666: yo bhagavan mārgākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā mārgākārajñatā, iti hi mārgākārajñatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3667: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo (ŚsP_II-1_196) mārgākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
XXsspp2_1u:3668: yo bhagavan sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvākārajñatā, iti hi sarvākārajñatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsspp2_1u:3669: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
XXsspp2_1u:3670: yat punar bhgavān ucyate rūpam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3671: kṛtā, yad ucyate vedanety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3672: yad ucyate saṃjñety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate saṃskārā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate vijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
XXsspp2_1u:3673: yad ucyate cakṣur ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate śrotram ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate ghrāṇam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate jihvety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate kāya ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate mana ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
XXsspp2_1u:3674: yad ucyate rūpam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate śabda ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate gandha ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate rasa
XXsspp2_1u:3675: ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate sparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate dharmā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
XXsspp2_1u:3676: yad ucyate cakṣurvijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3677: kṛtā, yad ucyate śrotravijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā
XXsspp2_1u:3678: gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate ghrāṇavijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate jihvāvijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate kāyavijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate manovijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
XXsspp2_1u:3679: yad ucyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā
XXsspp2_1u:3680: (ŚsP_II-1_197) gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate śrotrasaṃsparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate ghrāṇasaṃsparśa
XXsspp2_1u:3681: ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate jihvāsaṃsparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate kāyasaṃsparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate manaḥsaṃsparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
XXsspp2_1u:3682: yad ucyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanety
XXsspp2_1u:3683: advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3684: kṛtā, yad ucyate jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanety
XXsspp2_1u:3685: advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3687: yad ucyate pṛthivīdhātur ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3688: yad ucyate abdhātur ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate tejodhātur ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate vāyudhātur ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate ākāśadhātur ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate vijñānadhātur ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
XXsspp2_1u:3689: yad ucyate 'vidyety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate saṃskārā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate vijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate nāmarūpam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate ṣaḍāyatanam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate sparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate vedanety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate tṛṣṇety
XXsspp2_1u:3690: advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate upādānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate bhava ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate jātir ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate jarāmaraṇām ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā (ŚsP_II-1_198) gaṇanā kṛtā.
XXsspp2_1u:3691: yad ucyate dānapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3692: yad ucyate śīlapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3693: yad ucyate kṣāntipāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3694: yad ucyate vīryapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasyadharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3695: yad ucyate dhyānapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3696: yad ucyate prajñāpāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
XXsspp2_1u:3697: yad ucyate 'dhyātmaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3698: yad ucyate bahirdhāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3699: yad ucyate 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate śūnyatāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate mahāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate paramārthaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate saṃskṛtaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatety
XXsspp2_1u:3700: advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate 'tyantaśūnyatety
XXsspp2_1u:3701: advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate 'navarāgraśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate 'navakāraśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3702: yad ucyate prakṛtiśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3703: yad ucyate sarvadharmaśūnyatety advayasyā saṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3704: kṛtā, yad ucyate svalakṣaṇaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate 'nupalambhaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate 'bhāvaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate svabhāvaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatety
XXsspp2_1u:3706: yad ucyate smṛtyupasthānānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3707: kṛtā, yad ucyate samyakprahāṇānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3708: kṛtā, yad ucyate ṛddhipādā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3709: kṛtā, yad ucyate indriyānīti advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
XXsspp2_1u:3710: yad ucyate balānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya (ŚsP_II-1_199) dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate bodhyaṅgānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3711: kṛtā, yad ucyate āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate āryasatyānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate dhyānānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3712: kṛtā, yad ucyate 'pramāṇānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3713: kṛtā, yad ucyate ārūpyasamāpattaya ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā
XXsspp2_1u:3714: gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate vimokṣā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā
XXsspp2_1u:3715: gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā
XXsspp2_1u:3716: gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate 'bhijñā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā
XXsspp2_1u:3717: gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate samādhaya ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā
XXsspp2_1u:3718: gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate dhāraṇīmukhānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate daśatathāgatabalānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate catvāri vaiśāradyānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate catasraḥ
XXsspp2_1u:3719: pratisaṃvida ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate mahāmaitrīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate mahākaruṇety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā, yad ucyate 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3720: kṛtā, yad ucyate sarvajñatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3721: kṛtā, yad ucyate mārgākārajñatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
XXsspp2_1u:3722: kṛtā, yad ucyate sarvākārajñatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā
